source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video is a time-lapse of a powerful thunderstorm at night. The shot remains static on a dark, flat landscape as massive, turbulent clouds are illuminated from within by frequent flashes of pink and white lightning. The dramatic atmospheric event dominates the entire sky.
